      • msgSend

        long msgSend(Topic topic,
             co.tinode.tinodesdk.model.Drafty data)
        Message sent. Returns database ID of the message suitable for use in msgDelivered
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        data - message data to save
        Returns:
        database ID of the message suitable for use in msgDelivered(Topic topic, long id, Date timestamp, int seq)
